languages.text: "С этими словами на устах совершались самые чудовищные преступления против Империума. Заветы Его существуют не просто так — ты либо блюдешь их, либо получаешь заслуженное воздаяние".
"With these words have the most horrendous crimes against the Imperium been committed. His commandments exist for a reason. You either follow them or receive your just punishment."
languages.original_text: "С этими словами на устах совершались самые чудовищные преступления против Империума. Заветы Его существуют не просто так — ты либо блюдешь их, либо получаешь заслуженное воздаяние".

traits.locale_text: "Those words have been spoken before, even as the most horrendous crimes were being committed against the Imperium. His commandments exist for a reason. You either follow them or get the retribution you deserve."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Those words have been spoken before, even as the most horrendous crimes were being committed against the Imperium. His commandments exist for a reason. You either follow them or get the retribution you deserve."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "With these words were the most horrendous crimes against the Imperium committed. His commandments exist for a reason. You either follow them or receive well-deserved retribution."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "With these words were the most horrendous crimes against the Imperium committed. His commandments exist for a reason. You either follow them or receive well-deserved retribution."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "With these words have the most horrendous crimes against the Imperium been committed. His commandments exist for a reason. You either follow them or receive your just punishment."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "With these words have the most horrendous crimes against the Imperium been committed. His commandments exist for a reason. You either follow them or receive your just punishment."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Con esas mismas palabras se han perpetrado los crímenes más espantosos contra el Imperium. Sus mandamientos existen por un motivo. O se acatan, o se recibe un merecido castigo».
languages.original_text: "With these words have the most horrendous crimes against the Imperium been committed. His commandments exist for a reason. You either follow them or receive your just punishment."

traits.locale_text: «Con esas mismas palabras se han perpetrado los crímenes más espantosos contra el Imperium. Sus mandamientos existen por un motivo. O se acatan, o se recibe un merecido castigo».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “这种言论本身就是对帝国犯下的最可怕的罪行。祂的律法之所以存在，不是没有原因的。如果你不遵循祂的律法，你将会得到应有的报应。”
languages.original_text: "With these words have the most horrendous crimes against the Imperium been committed. His commandments exist for a reason. You either follow them or receive your just punishment."

traits.locale_text: “这样的话本身，就是对帝国犯下的最可怕的罪行。祂的律法之所以存在，不是没有原因的。如果你不遵循祂的律法，你将会得到应有的报应。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « C'est avec de telles paroles que les pires crimes contre l'Imperium ont été commis. Si Ses commandements existent, c'est pour une bonne raison. Soit vous les respectez, soit vous recevrez votre juste châtiment. »
languages.original_text: "With these words have the most horrendous crimes against the Imperium been committed. His commandments exist for a reason. You either follow them or receive your just punishment."

traits.locale_text: « C'est avec de telles paroles que les pires crimes contre l'Imperium ont été commis. Si Ses commandements existent, c'est pour une bonne raison. Soit vous les respectez, soit vous recevrez un châtiment bien mérité. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「この言葉によって、帝国に対する最も恐ろしい犯罪が行われた。主の戒律には理由がある。あなたにできることは、それに従うか、正当な罰を受けるかだ」
languages.original_text: "With these words have the most horrendous crimes against the Imperium been committed. His commandments exist for a reason. You either follow them or receive your just punishment."

traits.locale_text: 「この言葉によって、帝国に対する最も恐ろしい犯罪が行われた。主の戒律には理由がある。あなたにできることは、それに従うか、正当な罰を受けるかだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Mit diesen Worten wurden die grauenhaftesten Verbrechen gegen das Imperium verübt. Seine Gebote existieren nicht ohne Grund. Entweder befolgt Ihr sie oder Ihr bekommt die verdiente Strafe."
languages.original_text: "With these words have the most horrendous crimes against the Imperium been committed. His commandments exist for a reason. You either follow them or receive your just punishment."

traits.locale_text: "Mit diesen Worten wurden die grauenhaftesten Verbrechen gegen das Imperium verübt. Seine Gebote existieren nicht ohne Grund. Entweder befolgt Ihr sie oder Ihr bekommt die verdiente Strafe."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Bu sözler, İmparatorluk'a karşı işlenen en korkunç suçların başında gelir. O'nun emirleri, boşuna değildir. Ya onlara uyarsın ya da hak ettiğin cezayı çekersin."
languages.original_text: "With these words have the most horrendous crimes against the Imperium been committed. His commandments exist for a reason. You either follow them or receive your just punishment."

traits.locale_text: "Bu sözler, İmparatorluk'a karşı işlenen en korkunç suçların başında geliyor. O'nun emirleri boşuna var olmamıştır. Ya onlara uyarsın ya da hak ettiğin cezayı çekersin."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
